name: Smack- A board game
description:
This is a board game(looks like checkers but it's not). 

It's a 1v1 game(AI not made yet but will be added soon). In this game, you have to kill all the pawns of the opponent team. Every pawn moves one to all 4 directions(Can"t move diagonally). It can kill any pawn which comes in his Legal moves(except a friendly pawn).

It's Surely available for windows(not sure for Mac and Linux).

Some bugs are still there which will be solved soon.
